timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-10-07T05:43:28", "sender_email": "rachel.jirman@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "prachi.ko@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Rachel, Let\u2019s Complete Your UCL Student Accommodation Booking in London.", "message": "Hi,\\nAre there any rental options from January-June 2026?\\n\\nThanks\\n\\nOn Mon, Oct 6, 2025 at 10:36\u202fPM <[prachi.ko@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Rachel,\\n\\nWarm Greetings!\\n\\nThank you for reaching out through UCL University's official student accommodation platform, powered by Amber.. As UCL\u2019s exclusive and official accommodation partner, we are here to provide a seamless and secure booking experience, ensuring you find the perfect student home.\\n\\nYour reference number is #10076365054.\\n\\nI am Prachi, your dedicated booking manager for London, and I\u2019m here to assist you in securing a home that fits all your needs.\\n\\nTo proceed with your booking, please fill out the form for the property you have shortlisted:\\n\\nProperty Name: Chapter Portobello, London\\n\\nProperty Link: [https://amberstudent.com/places/chapter-portobello-london-1707310732338?whitelabelv2=true&utm_source=university-fad44b73]()\\n\\nOnce you submit the form, we\u2019ll handle all the paperwork and rental agreements on your behalf, ensuring a completely hassle-free experience. As UCL\u2019s trusted accommodation partner, we\u2019re here to support you at every step.\\n\\nPlease let me know if you have any queries or any specific requests. You can reply to this email, go to our website [amberstudent.com]() or WhatsApp me on the number mentioned in my signature below for further assistance.\\n\\nAlso, if you have friends looking for accommodation, you can refer them at [amberstudent.com](). If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card.\\n\\nCheck what our community of students have to say about us: [https://www.trustpilot.com/review/amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nPrachi K\\n\\nBookings Executive\\n\\nPhone: [+447830319649]() | Whatsapp Me\\n\\nEmail: [prachi.ko@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi, Are there any rental options from January-June 2026? Thanks On Mon, Oct 6, 2025 at 10:36 PM <prachi.ko@amberstudent.com> wrote: Hi Rachel, Warm Greetings! Thank you for reaching out through", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "prachi.ko@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "rachel.jirman@gmail.com"}

{"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-10-07T06:28:07", "sender_email": "prachi.ko@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "rachel.jirman@gmail.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Rachel, Let\u2019s Complete Your UCL Student Accommodation Booking in London.", "message": "Hello Rachel,\\n\\nGreetings of the day!\\n\\nI hope you are doing well. As UCL\u2019s trusted accommodation partner, we\u2019re here to support you at every step.\\n\\nPlease let me know if you have any queries or any specific requests. transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your mess.

Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker B: Hi Rachel, Good morning. I am Prachi from Amber Student. We are partnered with the University College London regarding the accommodation assistance to the students and we got the information from them that you're looking for the accommodation in London. So please do let me know what sort of property you are interested in so that I can help you out with some of the options as I have shared my WhatsApp with you so you can connect with me over there. It will be easy for us to have a discussion or you can reply me on my email also. Thank you. Have a nice day. Bye. Bye.
